q_en: Have all of John's orders been completed?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "John"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = 2;
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for all orders placed by the customer "John"

results.input:
Check if any of the orders have been completed
['tool_find_order_details, {"order_id": 2}, Find the product details of an order']
results.output: None of the orders have been completed yet.
